feed.title: Radarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.8.3.8933
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 93d661242a283b93a93105e9d9765c935a1e9e2b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 324dac8db3a77e78011300d92fa3b156fea56b19 New: Bump dotnet to 6.0.32
  • bba69d8b2240e98dda31389d4195c83078c0df29 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 1366f6e8b4d1960558fb4f170272ba47c05c4a45 New: Show update settings on all platforms [ #10184 ]
  • f79712951b081fcb4fdfcc030f9bcaa31aadbd7a Fixed: Assume category path from qBittorent starting with '//' is a Windows UNC path [#10162 ]
  • 101b04675381ea08e7a48470e0fe7639967ed66b Fix custom formats sorting for quality profiles
  • cd713e7252f4e2be4c40def6eb654c75ee75f4ac New: Sort by tags on movie index
  • a54f54eb6efc492ad0fed4a52cc2b85539aca309 New: Add option to show tags on movies Poster and Overview [ #10176 ]
  • f2af7a1b727c5be24e3fda1b58e6ba2c0153b658 New: Use natural sorting for lists of items in the UI [ #10177 ]
  • a5b48153a6fb22b5a2ee6e51df8f8a9265414152 New: Add a few spanish release groups to exceptions (#10120)
See More * 1804e486d6d80306596d23e47b73cf69ba6ab1dc New: Wrap specifications in Custom Format and Auto Tagging modals * b490177a77f583126b88a3d4330e879e1b121e8d Remove extraneous indentation in RemoveFileExtension * 7a90b4a6b2d6fee59881b76834a6e63c0283adc7 Bump version to 5.8.3 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=114&_a=release-summary).

What's Changed

  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Remove extraneous indentation in RemoveFileExtension' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10171
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'New: Wrap specifications in Custom Format and Auto Tagging modals' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10180
  • New: Add a few spanish release groups to exceptions by @eagnoor in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10120
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Fixed: Assume category path from qBittorent starting with '//' is a Windows UNC path' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10183
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10105
  • New: Bump dotnet to 6.0.32 by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10189
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10191

New Contributors

  • @eagnoor made their first contribution in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10120

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/compare/v5.8.2.8915...v5.8.3.8933

What's Changed

  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10097
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Fixed: Exclude invalid releases from Newznab and Torznab parsers' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10109
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'New: Ignore Deluge torrents without a title' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10112
  • Update API docs by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10115
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Fixed: Reprocessing items that were previously blocked during importing' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10117
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Fixed: Limit Queue maximum page size to 200' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10119
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Fixed: Already imported downloads appearing in Queue briefly' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10128
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Fixed: Trimming disabled logs database' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10130
  • Fixed: add non-numeric codec tags to SourceRegex in QualityParser by @martylukyy in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10155
  • Update SonarCloud pipeline versions for UI by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10157
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Remove extraneous indentation in RemoveFileExtension' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10171
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'New: Wrap specifications in Custom Format and Auto Tagging modals' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10180
  • New: Add a few spanish release groups to exceptions by @eagnoor in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10120
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Fixed: Assume category path from qBittorent starting with '//' is a Windows UNC path' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10183
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10105
  • New: Bump dotnet to 6.0.32 by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10189
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10191

New Contributors

  • @martylukyy made their first contribution in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10155
  • @eagnoor made their first contribution in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10120

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/compare/v5.7.0.8882...v5.8.3.8933

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.9.1.9070
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • fc4f4ab21125cd3817133434acc0c10fba680930 Automated API Docs update
  • 333e8281ea3ae93720bcd1ba4969ba35bea93b5a Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • c278ffd8a07a4a7c4c920a9cb78441343ccdd0cb Fix typos and improve log messages
  • 5898eea3d0a8df85d4c559fa5fa1e2c9c208ffb5 Bump babel packages [ #10320 ]
  • 5b78a1297adb4a45eae3ae8f37978ead83e34dde Use autoprefixer in UI build [ #10319 ]
  • 14e3e1fa353c97fdbf94d5983452d3577240d354 New: Configure log file size limit in UI [ #10318 ]
  • c0e76544ef7e5a29576d67bc56ccca7c1b4db251 Bump version to 5.9.1
  • 8c1667787501e4b3c99b6bc35e3f7bac93de6406 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate

This list of changes was auto generated.

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.10.4.9218
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 480bb50b857c6916c73ba48157c0d53bf158a23c Fixed: Rejections for Custom Format score increment
  • dbc94dbe4e66923412294529ea2a025d7d58ddec Simplify fallback to default for allowed sort keys
  • b89271fc0130039d3fc26354bfdb1d335d558cb4 Fixed: Unable to login when instance name contained brackets
  • 66fcde7325a3eb3ae5a475911cdb4c0fff323083 Include current quality in rejection message for not an upgrade
  • 463741da1fdbba5a88107063d64f518bb315bcee New: Fetch up to 1000 movies from Plex Watchlist
  • 3388fae1a5ae38838b5eff77a8a6a27e28c7679a Fix translation key for Skip Free Space Check help text

Availability for add movie modals * 453f216e0d5d1d51b8c6ae32987b52026546746b New: Add Malayalam and Kannada languages * 2d4846e5be1dc1ca8ad2bcfedaf46a35697d05da New: Add Macedonian and Slovenian languages * 2700a6cf8a5b7a9ce61582d471a45ebda35eab69 Fixed: Paths for renamed movie files in Custom Script and Webhook [ #10359 ] * 674e414111177b8fa9f962bdc6b0846cd36283bd Don't persist value for MovieQuality to TypeScript * 0d6ba200d366256e26bdc29348ce101ab61f4c20 Fixed: Hide reboot and shutdown UI buttons on docker [ #10358 ] * 93298645e312c685d5a75a143667d6d522b472c5 Render with ternary in Limit redirects after login to local paths * caf2d33c11f25c5a802deca4aee14bf1f114f07d Fixed: Keeping search results when Missing/Cutoff Unmet repopulates * bc918ed3b5e6b1c18fd7d6f91db0282fe7e1a472 entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.11.0.9244
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 7b43c2e345741de183c2acd56afd10886f120b11 Fixed: Loading movie images after placeholder in Safari [ #10474 ]
  • dc599b6531aca7906122e6e13402fe4cb1ceddaa Sort allowed sorting keys
  • 1421179654d71c0cf1e6db8bfe27cd928798add2 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 41dcf32e24119eeb24de84791129ee08e3547b25 Fix translations for MovieMonitoredSelectInput
  • 7a813a44b6589ba8cd75fd3c1d4daa3e80790001 Use UTC to calculate movie status
  • 54a50590801ead63b3e20a4dd272aa181ebe6481 Convert AvailabilitySelectInput to TypeScript
  • adaf7444d31ab450eb750fe11358753a7313c094 Add movie availability descriptions
  • 49d11e59b3b31a15069627322cf9ca8aff1f8e49 Fixed: Telegram Log Message
  • a7eb4a4a0454ffab149a34a800abe519eceeaf6a Automated API Docs update
  • 66a6a663ba28f5a2bba252a8c4483ddeffa5bfab Prevent line wraps on mobile for ratings
See More * f735e318358eb2cfdc1c4b425418f4671bce5f2f New: Trakt ratings * b8f1286abb8299b764aad6194c4b37b00b3f41ea Fixed: Sorting queue by columns * 9df45199d09edaa8d5c01ad5f387dd27276da812 Reprocessing manual import items unable to detect sample [ #10463 ] * a692c35b033210e5a7d108997445b4a80ef0b46d Automated API Docs update * ddcad270c3237fe48e3703190a2c3c1efa83f973 Fix description for API key as query parameter * b06f1d7c127551bca51f3a6cd86a95d10cd934a7 Bump version to 5.11.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=127&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.12.2.9335
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 889d0710046e34c7173b64067ecdd0a9ee5b177a New: Display items tags on import lists index
  • 0049922ab6809be48e96726a4f4006d711051b7d Include exception message in SkyHook failure message
  • 3c995a0fff4caf8e68e398dc263887c06211a84f Bump babel packages
  • 430719baacd6cf97ec2eb8a64d77efa0aefbe32d Remove unused gulp packages
  • 9928d711a3bb72d40c99541bfc530eb7bcad811b Trim multiple occurrences of ending separators in filename
  • f90b43b3e1c7d938eaaf290148b488d3b814968a Simplify parsing IMDb and TMDb urls as search terms
  • 64122b4cfb3bf53bdbf5c924baee5e1b0814501a Auto-detect building on macOS ARM (#10539)
  • 7912a942f71256efde95d715474a950248267357 Bump frontend packages
  • 0a7607bb62b26ecec2fff09bd7f48e1a55144437 Bump dotnet packages
  • beeb5204b825f669083cfff56e6a581d0737b5b5 New: Parse IMDB and TMDB URLs as search terms
See More * ab13fb6e99d61c312580d38a70759dd135438dd0 Fix index variable in fuse worker * 2a3d595a66244c3256b87798c3f385bf411e7cc1 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 958a863d8f62bd24714ab132f85c48f10251dcdb Recompare file size after import file if necessary * 8b7884deb0a6ed5d45e01462600a90706f9f3208 Automated API Docs update * 9a22e1c791750fb356a98cba3e402cb9cc348a36 Bump browserslist-db * f0f828491b7002cfa0613241b2b4e73c32d6c4e9 Fixed: Copy to clipboard in non-secure contexts [ #10525 ] * 7f3d107eda88eaa3c5b7e131bdb0f4d6714b79d4 Convert ClipboardButton to TypeScript [ #10452 ] * ce4477eeacc05356752e7757ae35274e68a590ca Improve filename examples for movies naming * 8b64f873f47e732cf318c2874695f087261c948d Convert Naming options to TypeScript * 38bd06096047dfc235451c63938a03c929190df1 Convert FormInputButton to TypeScript * 7c243cb6e8ec9df123f6ecd4f5707668287b69a9 Fixed: Error updating providers with ID missing from JSON * b29dee63f4b493c1e5e28a240bb05155bd7ff199 Use the first allowed quality for cutoff met rejection message with disabled upgrades * f6542bab0a6c05760b4d926d9d87720ed136f38a New: Use 307 redirect for requests missing URL Base * da1b53b7e250df25ebfc5e02f32054d4c6cdced8 Bump macOS runner version to 13 * 0deae95782f2cb21cbbbd15470d0fc8b037a7e61 Bump version to 5.12.2 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=130&_a=release-summary).
